entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
